plugin.name: Japanese Localization
plugin.long-description: Liferay's Japanese Localization hook customizes Liferay Portal for Japanese users and administrators. With respect to user name input fields and user name display, the hook properly lists the user's surname first and drops the use of any middle name. In addition, the hook adjusts Liferay Portal to use Japanese compatible address fields.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: MongoDB Expando Adapter
plugin.tags: db, expando, ha, json, nosql, redundancy, sql
plugin.long-description:
This app replaces the backend storage system used for Liferay's "Expando" service framework to use MongoDB instead of the default SQL database used by the rest of Liferay. Many features in Liferay make use of Expandos (such as Document Data Lists and Custom User Attributes). If you need high performance in these areas, consider using MongoDB. MongoDB is an open source, document-oriented NoSQL database. MongoDB focuses on four main things: flexibility, power, speed, and ease of use. MongoDB stores data in JSON documents and contains built-in redundancy and high availability features. For more detail on MongoDB, visit http://mongodb.org. There are multiple portlets included in this app.

This app installs as a Liferay service.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Sample Servlet Filter Hook
plugin.short-description: This hook shows how to add a new Servlet Filter to Liferay's core.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Sample Struts Action
plugin.short-description: This hook shows how to extend Liferay's core Struts actions.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Sample Wrapper
plugin.short-description: This hook shows how to wrap Liferay's core services and models.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Social Bookmarks
plugin.long-description: This app adds additional social bookmarks to Liferay's built-in set of Social Bookmarks. These bookmarks can be used by custom apps, and are also used by Liferay's built-in apps such as its Blogs portlet. Social Bookmarks allow users to easily post a reference to Liferay content on their favorite social networking website. In addition, some websites offer counters that can immediately show users how many people have bookmarked a particular piece of user-generated content.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: 1-2-1 Columns Layout
plugin.long-description:
Layout Templates allow you to choose how portlets will be arranged on a page. They are simple table or CSS-based containers into which portlets can be dropped and sit within the body of the page. Liferay Portal comes with several built-in layout templates, but if you require a more complex page layout you may wish to use this custom layout template. A thumbnail is displayed when the end user clicks Layout Template from the Dock menu. Consult the "Page Creation and Management" section of the Liferay User Guide for details on administering this service. The Liferay User Guide can be found at http://liferay.com/documentation.

This layout will appear in your Page Layouts once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: 1-3-1 Columns Layout
plugin.long-description:
Layout Templates allow you to choose how portlets will be arranged on a page. They are simple table or CSS-based containers into which portlets can be dropped and sit within the body of the page. Liferay Portal comes with several built-in layout templates, but if you require a more complex page layout you may wish to use this custom layout template. A thumbnail is displayed when the end user clicks Layout Template from the Dock menu. Consult the "Page Creation and Management" section of the Liferay User Guide for details on administering this service. The Liferay User Guide can be found at http://liferay.com/documentation.

This layout will appear in your Page Layouts once installed.

plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Akismet
plugin.tags: akismet, forums, message boards, sanitize, spam
plugin.long-description:
This app integrates Liferay with Akismet. Akismet is a web-based service which automatically detects and eliminates spam from your Liferay message boards, blogs, and wikis. To use this app, obtain an API key from akismet.com and configure it via Control Panel. Once this app is installed and enabled, each forum post, or comment on content such as blogs and wikis will be passed through Akismet. If the post is detected as spam, it will be rejected with a helpful error message.

Internet access is required for this app to work.

This app will appear in your Control Panel once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Chat
plugin.long-description:
Liferay's Chat portlet provides a convenient way of allowing users to send each other instant messages when they are logged into a Liferay site. It appears as at the bottom of every page, and displays who is logged on, their statuses, and any chats the logged-in user has open. Users can also set audio alerts, and engage in multiple chats.

This app may appear at the bottom of the page.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Flash
plugin.tags: documents and media, flash, social, video
plugin.long-description:
This Flash app allows easy publishing of Adobe Flash content into Liferay. The Flash source file can be specified through a URL so it's possible to publish videos, presentation, games, from a remote website, or directly from Liferay's Documents and Media Gallery.

This app will appear in your Application menu once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Liferay Plugin for Google AdSense™
plugin.long-description:
Google AdSense is a free, simple way for website publishers of all sizes to earn money by displaying targeted Google ads on their websites. AdSense also lets you provide Google search to your site users, while earning money by displaying Google ads on the search results pages.

This app automatically displays Google Ads based on your AdSense account information and configuration. Options allow you to select your publisher and channel from which ads are served.

This app will appear in your Application menu once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Logos RefTagger
plugin.short-description: This plugin transforms Bible references via RefTagger.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Message Boards Subscription Manager
plugin.tags: category, control panel, message board, subscription manager
plugin.long-description:
This app facilitates managing Liferay Portal message boards category subscriptions. In particular, it lets site administrators view user subscriptions and subscribe multiple users to message boards categories.

This app will appear in the Configuration page of Site Administration once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Netvibes Widget
plugin.long-description:
Netvibes is a personalized dashboard publishing platform for the Web that includes digital life management, widget distribution services and brand observation rooms.

This app acts as a "container" for Netvibes widgets, such that they can be "hosted" on Liferay and placed on individual pages within a Liferay site.

This app allows you to select from the thousands of existing NetVibes widgets to display on your Liferay sites.

This app will appear in your Application menu once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Release Tools
plugin.short-description: This plugin is used by Liferay release managers to track packages among the Liferay public site, the SourceForge downloads page, and the SourceForge SVN repository.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Ruby Console
plugin.short-description: This plugin provides a console for executing arbitrary Ruby code. Use this portlet should only be used for development.

plugin.name: Stocks
plugin.long-description:
This app provides a way to visualize the real-time stock price for a given set of stock ticker symbols. Users can enter custom lists to be displayed, or the portlet can be configured to be the same list for all users. Clicking on a stock ticker symbol or entering one in will display a detailed graph of historical values for the stock price of the given symbol.

This app will appear in your Application menu once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Tour IPC Portlet
plugin.short-description: This is the Sun Tour IPC plugin. Released April 22, 2008

plugin.name: Vimeo
plugin.long-description:
This app makes it easy to embed Vimeo videos into Liferay pages. The size, placement, and user options can be configured to optimize the visual appearance of the video and allow for things like full screen playback.

This app will appear in your Application menu once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Sample Styled Minimal
plugin.short-description: This is a sample styled theme with minimal configuration set in liferay-plugin-package.properties.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Zoe Brochure
plugin.tags: corporate, custom layout, featured item, image carousel, site template, theme
plugin.long-description:
Zoe Brochure offers a modern corporate feel to your site and is versatile enough to be used by a wide variety of industries. The theme comes standard with structures and templates that can be customized to present your products and services with visual appeal. This theme also features a 2-1-2 Columns layout, an image carousel, featured content, and featured download button.

This layout will appear in your Page Settings, under Available Themes once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Zoe Healthcare
plugin.tags: contact form, corporate, featured item, footer contact blurb, footer navigation, healthcare, medical, search, theme, webform portlet
plugin.long-description:
Zoe Healthcare is a preset theme catering to the medical industry. Our theme includes features and templates that can produce custom layouts to outline medical services, chart out available health care plans, and schedule appointments using our form portlet. We utilize a customizable advanced footer that includes: a text blurb, footer navigation, footer links, and social networking links. In the advanced footer you are able to replace any section with web content using a uniquely generated article ID.

This layout will appear in your Page Settings, under Available Themes once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Zoe Resort
plugin.tags: featured item, footer navigation, footer social links, hotel, image carousel, resort, site template, theme
plugin.long-description:
Zoe Resort utilizes a clean layout structure and large dedicated image spaces catering to the needs of the hotel and resort industry, with prominent banners throughout. The theme features a 3-3-3 columns layout, an image carousel, breadcrumbs, featured content, and footer social network links. We utilize a customizable "advanced footer" that includes a text blurb, footer navigation, footer links and social networking links. In the advanced footer you are able to replace any section with web content using a uniquely generated article ID.

This layout will appear in your Page Settings, under Available Themes once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Zoe Tech
plugin.tags: advanced footer, corporate, custom layout, featured item, footer blurb, search, site template, theme
plugin.long-description:
This theme provides a clean and professional feel. It allows you to showcase your clients, services, and products using featured content on the homepage as well as a special image carousel built for this theme. It features a 1-3-1 Column layout only available for the Zoe Tech theme. We utilize a customizable "advanced footer" that includes: a text blurb, footer navigation, footer links, and social networking links. In the advanced footer you are able to replace any section with web content using a uniquely generated article ID.

This layout will appear in your Page Settings, under Available Themes once installed.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Central Authentication Service
plugin.long-description:
The Central Authentication Service (CAS) is a single sign-on protocol for the web that permits a user to access multiple applications while providing their credentials (such as user id and password) only once. It also allows web applications to authenticate users without gaining access to a user's security credentials, such as a password. This app provides integration between Liferay and a CAS implementation, such that users can achieve Single Sign-On when visiting a Liferay site.

This app will install to your application server or servlet container.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Ehcache Cluster
plugin.tags: cluster, ehcache, enterprise, ha, high availability, replication
plugin.long-description:
Liferay portal relies upon both content and object caching to minimize database interaction and excessive object creation. Out of the box, the portal leverages ehCache for its caching needs. You may configure additional caches including Terracotta, osCache, Oracle Coherence Cache, and others. Liferay Portal has hundreds of object caches that require event cached object replication or cache event replication. By default, the out-of-the-box ehCache configuration uses a thread-per-cache replication algorithm that may introduce additional overhead. This app provides Enterprise Edition customers an enhanced algorithm that uses more efficient thread pooling for cached object and event replication. To configure the portal to use this algorithm, download and install this app, and refer to the Liferay Developer Network for details on how to configure this app for optimal cache performance.

This app will install to your application server or servlet container.
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.

plugin.name: Skinny JSON Provider
plugin.tags: content, ddl, json, rest, servicebuilder, services web plugin
plugin.long-description:
Liferay's Skinny JSON Provider app provides streamlined representations of your portal's Web Content Articles and Dynamic Data Lists. It gives you lean essential asset data that you can quickly process and analyze.
On installing the app, its JSON web services are available. You can invoke these services from any client that supports JSON. Liferay's page for the JSON web service API has forms that let you try the services. This page also shows you what the client code looks like in JavaScript, cURL, and URL formats.
That's the "skinny" on Liferay's Skinny JSON Provider!
plugin.author: Liferay, Inc.
